1:
CIRCULAR NO  21 / 2002 
 
Sub:  
  
 
 
MHA have informed that M/s sam Aviation Private Limited had been flying 
cargo aircraft between India and the CIS countries by submitting fake 
recommendation letters of the Embassy of Kazakhstan to MEA and thereby 
obtaining flight landing permission from DGCA for which Jaideep Mirchandi, 
CMD, Siraj Amani, from Executive Director and Madhur Michael, Manager 
(Operations) of the company were arrested on 18.04.2002. A case F.I.R. No. 
02/2002 dated 16.04.2002was registered u/s 419/420/468/471/120-B IPS PS 
Special Cell, Lodhi Colony,  New Delhi.  The case is currently posted in the 
country of Smt. Sangeeta Dhingra, CMM, Tis Hazari Court. 
 
2. 
In view of the above approval of Security Manual in respect of the M/s 
Sam Aviation Ltd given by this Bureau vide letter No. CAS-6 (1) / 2000/Div-II 
(SA) dated 26.09.2000 is withdrawn with immediate effect. 
 
3. 
PICs issued to the officials of M/S Sam Aviation Ltd.  Are cancelled with 
immediate effect.  No employee of M/S Sam Aviation Ltd. Shall be allowed to 
gain entry into the airport on the strength of PICs issued to them by the Bureau.  
PICs shall be confiscated by Airport Security staff / PIC Committee / officers of 
BCAS. 
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
(R.K.Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of Secuity (CA) 
 
 
Ref. No.CAS-7(29)/97-DIV-1 Date   :21.08.2002
